channel.title: [Renamed] Adding objects?

item.title: [Renamed] Adding objects?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Where did you add it in your ObjectDef class?

I actually just edited my ObjectDef class so it handles now handled by a switch statement (It’s easier that way imo).
but it was added along with the rest of my custom objects. I’ve also tried variations of the code (from what’s inside there already).

				case 21525:
					objectDef.name = "Name Here"; 
					objectDef.description = "Not working :(".getBytes();
					objectDef.anInt744 = 1;
					objectDef.anInt761 = 1;
					objectDef.anIntArray773 = new int[1];
					objectDef.anIntArray773[0] = 70000;
					objectDef.itemActions = new String[5];
					objectDef.itemActions[0] = "Custom Action";
					objectDef.hasActions = true;
					objectDef.aBoolean767 = false;
					objectDef.aBoolean762 = false;
					objectDef.aBoolean769 = false;
				break;

Yes, I changed the name (Id?) of the model in my cache to 70000 too.

Read full topic

item.title: [Renamed] Adding objects?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Alright, I’ve got the model added to my cache (67888). I’ve added ints. But it doesn’t spawn.

if (i == 21525) {
    objectDef.name = "Name Here"; 
    objectDef.description = "Not working :(".getBytes();
    objectDef.anInt744 = 1;
    objectDef.anInt761 = 1;
    objectDef.anIntArray773 = new int[1];
    objectDef.anIntArray773[0] = 67888;
    objectDef.itemActions = new String[5];
    objectDef.itemActions[0] = "Custom Action";
    objectDef.hasActions = true;
    objectDef.aBoolean767 = false;
    objectDef.aBoolean762 = false;
    objectDef.aBoolean769 = false;
}

It won’t show in game.
I stole the ints from another custom model that was already added in my server.
Yes, I’m going to be using the custom action.
There was no errors. Nothing.

Read full topic
